name: Boba Chat
description:
Your parents have brought home a stranger.

You're determined to chat him up.

A short game made for the 2023 Queer edition of O2A2! This is a story that takes place in the universe of my future Josei/BAF VN Jam project. However, no knowledge of that project is needed to enjoy this  ^^

Features:

-A mysterious boy

-997 words

-One sprite, one music file, one background

Credits:

Fireplace Sound Effect by JuliusH from Pixabay
